name: Manhandla EX
author: Alucard648
info: Extended veriant of Z1 Manhandla. Made on request by SkyFlare
description: Extended variant of Z1 Manhandla with more customizability. Moves and fires like a normal 4, or 8 headed boss. But it can have body u[ to 4x4 with 16 heads
setup: Uses 2 enemy slots, 1 for core, 1 or head. Use "other" enemy type for heads.Step speed, homing factor and other default params used. Head enemy must be "other" type, only HP, damage and defenses used. Body`s Weapon damage dictates damage dealt by Manhandla`s eweapons.Attribute 1: Delay batween firing EWeapons, in frames.Attribute 2: Enemy size and number of heads, 1 - 1x1(4 heads), 2- 2x2(8 heads), 3 -3x3(12 heads), 4 - 4x4(16 heads)Attribute 3: Speed increase modifier with each head killed, stacked additivelyAttribute 4: Enemy ID for heads, uses next ID in list by defaultAttribute 5: Sprite used by fired EWeapons
